Mods.CalamityMod.SkyOreText.Origin: The ground is glittering with cyan light.
Mods.CalamityMod.SkyOreText.Translation: 苍青色的光辉照耀着这片土地。

Mods.CalamityMod.IceOreText.Origin: The ice caves are crackling with frigid energy.
Mods.CalamityMod.IceOreText.Translation: 寒晶能量从冰之洞穴中迸发而出。

Mods.CalamityMod.PlantOreText.Origin: Energized plant matter has formed in the underground.
Mods.CalamityMod.PlantOreText.Translation: 富含能量的植物物质已在地下形成。

Mods.CalamityMod.TreeOreText.Origin: Fossilized tree bark is bursting through the jungle's mud.
Mods.CalamityMod.TreeOreText.Translation: 石化树皮正在丛林的淤泥中爆发。

Mods.CalamityMod.AuricOreText.Origin: A godly aura has blessed the world's caverns.
Mods.CalamityMod.AuricOreText.Translation: 神之光环祝福了这个世界的洞穴。

Mods.CalamityMod.FutureOreText.Origin: A cold and dark energy has materialized in space.
Mods.CalamityMod.FutureOreText.Translation: 冷黯的能量散布至宇宙之间。

Mods.CalamityMod.SteelSkullBossText.Origin: A blood red inferno lingers in the night...
Mods.CalamityMod.SteelSkullBossText.Translation: 一束血红狱火徘徊于夜空之中……

Mods.CalamityMod.BabyBossText.Origin: A plague has befallen the Jungle.

Mods.CalamityMod.BabyBossText2.Origin: An ancient automaton roams the land.
Mods.CalamityMod.BabyBossText2.Translation: 一个远古造物漫游在大地之上。

Mods.CalamityMod.MoonBossText2.Translation: 宇宙的恐惧正注着这一切……

Mods.CalamityMod.PlagueBossText.Origin: PLAGUE NUKE BARRAGE ARMED, PREPARING FOR LAUNCH!!!
Mods.CalamityMod.PlagueBossText.Translation: 瘟疫核弹已就绪，准备发射！！！

Mods.CalamityMod.PlagueBossText2.Translation: 导弹已发射，目标定位系统开启！！！

Mods.CalamityMod.ProfanedBossText2.Origin: Shrieks are echoing from the dungeon.
Mods.CalamityMod.ProfanedBossText2.Translation: 尖叫声回荡于地牢之中。

Mods.CalamityMod.ProfanedBossText3.Origin: The calamitous beings have been inundated with bloodstone.
Mods.CalamityMod.ProfanedBossText3.Translation: 灾厄造物已被血石洗礼。

Mods.CalamityMod.GhostBossText.Origin: The abyssal spirits have been disturbed.

Mods.CalamityMod.GhostBossText2.Origin: Wails echo through the dilapidated dungeon halls...
Mods.CalamityMod.GhostBossText2.Translation: 哀嚎声回响在破旧的地牢大厅之中……

Mods.CalamityMod.GhostBossText3.Origin: Long-dead prisoners seek their zealous revenge...
Mods.CalamityMod.GhostBossText3.Translation: 逝去已久的囚犯们寻求着自己的狂热复仇……

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText3.Origin: Alright, let's get started. Not sure why you're bothering.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText3.Translation: 好吧，那我们就正式开始吧，虽然我并不明白你这么做是为了什么。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText4.Origin: You seem so confident, even though you are painfully ignorant of what has yet to transpire.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText4.Translation: 你看起来很自信，但你对接下来将要到来的痛苦一无所知。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText5.Origin: Everything was going well until you came along.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText5.Translation: 你出现在这里之前，一切都正常进行着。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText6.Origin: Brothers, could you assist me for a moment? This ordeal is growing tiresome.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText6.Translation: 兄弟们，能暂时帮个忙吗？这场折磨似乎越来越累人了。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText.Origin: Don't worry, I still have plenty of tricks left.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText.Translation: 你在担心什么？我还没拿出全力呢。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText7.Origin: Hmm...perhaps I should let the little ones out to play for a while.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText7.Translation: 嗯……看来得让那些小家伙们出来玩一会儿了。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText9.Translation: 我现在才刚刚拿出全力！

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText22.Origin: Even if you defeat me you would still have the lord to contend with!
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText22.Translation: 即使你击败了我，你还是得直面我的主人！

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText23.Origin: He has never lost a battle!
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText23.Translation: 他至今没有输掉过一场战斗！

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText24.Origin: Not even I could defeat him! What hope do you have!?
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText24.Translation: 连我都只能臣服于他！就凭你又有什么希望！？

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText25.Origin: He has grown far stronger since we last fought...you stand no chance.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText25.Translation: 哪怕是在现在，在我们战斗的期间，他的实力依然在恐怖地增长着……你根本毫无胜算。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText26.Origin: Well...I suppose this is the end...
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText26.Translation: 好吧……我估计这就是结局了。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText27.Origin: Perhaps one of these times I'll change my mind...
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText27.Translation: 也许在那么多次之后我会改变主意……

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText28.Origin: You aren't hurting as much as I'd like...are you cheating?
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText28.Translation: 你好像受到的伤害不合常理啊……你是不是玩不起？

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText10.Origin: At long last I am free...for a time. I'll keep coming back, just like you. Until we meet again, farewell.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText10.Translation: 终于，我自由了……至少暂时是。我会不断回来，就像你一样。再见，下次我们还会见面的。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText11.Origin: Do you enjoy going through hell?

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText12.Origin: Don't get me wrong, I like pain too, but you're just ridiculous.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText12.Translation: 不要误解我，我也喜欢痛苦，但你只是一个纯粹的神经病。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText13.Origin: You must enjoy dying more than most people, huh?
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText13.Translation: 哼？我猜你一定比大多数人都更加热衷于死亡。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText14.Origin: Do you have a fetish for getting killed or something?
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText14.Translation: 你是找死找上瘾了还是怎么着？

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText15.Origin: Alright, I'm done counting. You probably died this much just to see what I'd say.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText15.Translation: 够了，我不会再给你计数了。我甚至觉得你死这么多次只是为了看我的反应。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText16.Origin: You didn't die at all huh? Welp, you probably cheated. Do it again, for real this time...but here's your reward I guess.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText16.Translation: 可你甚至没有死？好吧，或许你是作弊了。不管怎么说，再试一次，这次认真试一次……最后，这是给你的奖励。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText17.Origin: One death? That's it? ...I guess you earned this then.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText17.Translation: 就死过一次？那就这样了？……这是你的奖励。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText18.Origin: Two deaths, nice job. Here's your reward.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText18.Translation: 只有两次死亡，干的不错，你的奖励在这儿。

Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText19.Origin: Third time's the charm. Here's a special reward.
Mods.CalamityMod.SupremeBossText19.Translation: 过一过二不过三，给你特别的奖励。

Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText2.Translation: 你以为这种东西也能杀死……我？！

Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText8.Origin: Are you honestly that bad at dodging?
Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText8.Translation: 你真的连躲闪都不会吗？

Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText9.Origin: Of all my segments to get hit by...
Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText9.Translation: 这么长的身体，唯一命中的居然是……

Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText11.Origin: A GOD DOES NOT FEAR DEATH!

Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText12.Origin: You are no god...but I shall feast upon your essence regardless!
Mods.CalamityMod.EdgyBossText12.Translation: 你不是神……但你的灵魂仍是我的盛宴！

Mods.CalamityMod.DoGBossText.Translation: 寒霜之月散发着明洁的光辉。

Mods.CalamityMod.DoGBossText2.Translation: 收割之月散布着诡异的光芒。

Mods.CalamityMod.AstralText.Origin: A star has fallen from the heavens!
Mods.CalamityMod.AstralText.Translation: 一颗明星从天堂中坠陨！

Mods.CalamityMod.AureusBossText.Origin: The astral enemies have been empowered!

Mods.CalamityMod.AureusBossText2.Origin: A faint ethereal click can be heard from the dungeon.
Mods.CalamityMod.AureusBossText2.Translation: 微弱的异界之音游离在地牢中。

Mods.CalamityMod.AstralBossText.Origin: The seal of the stars has been broken! You can now mine Astral Ore.
Mods.CalamityMod.AstralBossText.Translation: 幻星的封印已破碎！你可以挖炫星矿了。

Mods.CalamityMod.DeusText.Origin: A star-spawned horror tunnels through the astral infection.
Mods.CalamityMod.DeusText.Translation: 诞生于星辰之间的恐惧穿梭在星辉瘟疫中。

Mods.CalamityMod.DeusText3.Origin: The god of the stars draws near...

Mods.CalamityMod.CalamitasBossText3.Translation: 你成功给我留下了深刻的印象，留下了最深刻的印象……

Mods.CalamityMod.SandSharkText.Origin: Something stirs in the warm desert sands...
Mods.CalamityMod.SandSharkText.Translation: 沙漠的沙子中有什么东西正在行动……

Mods.CalamityMod.SandSharkText2.Translation: 一个巨大的顶级掠食者接近了……

Mods.CalamityMod.DargonBossText2.Origin: My dragon deems you an unworthy opponent. You must acquire the power of the dark sun to witness his true power.
Mods.CalamityMod.DargonBossText2.Translation: 我的龙不把你视为一个旗鼓相当的对手。你只有取得了黑蚀之日的力量，才能见识到他真正的能力。

Mods.CalamityMod.DeathText.Origin: Death is active, enjoy the fun.
Mods.CalamityMod.DeathText.Translation: 死亡模式已开启，祝你游戏愉快。

Mods.CalamityMod.DeathText2.Origin: Death is not active, not fun enough for you?
Mods.CalamityMod.DeathText2.Translation: 死亡模式已关闭，对你而言还不够愉快？

Mods.CalamityMod.ArmageddonText.Origin: Bosses will now kill you instantly.

Mods.CalamityMod.ArmageddonText2.Origin: Bosses will no longer kill you instantly.

Mods.CalamityMod.DefiledText2.Origin: Your soul is yours once more...

Mods.CalamityMod.IronHeartText.Origin: Iron Heart is active, don't die.
Mods.CalamityMod.IronHeartText.Translation: 钢铁之心已开启，别浪死的太快。

Mods.CalamityMod.IronHeartText2.Origin: Iron Heart is not active, you can die again.
Mods.CalamityMod.IronHeartText2.Translation: 钢铁之心已关闭，你又可以去浪了。

Mods.CalamityMod.FlameText.Origin: The air is getting warmer around you.
Mods.CalamityMod.FlameText.Translation: 你周围的空气变得灼热起来。

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushStartText.Origin: Hmm? Ah, another contender. Very well, may the ritual commence!
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushStartText.Translation: 嗯？啊，又一位挑战者。嗯，好，很好，那就让仪式开始吧！

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierOneEndText.Origin: Hmm? Oh, you're still alive. Unexpected, but don't get complacent just yet.
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierOneEndText.Translation: 嗯？喔，你还活着啊。想不到想不到，但你别就因为这点程度就自满咯～

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierTwoEndText.Origin: Hmm? Persistent aren't you? Perhaps you have some hope of prosperity, unlike past challengers.
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierTwoEndText.Translation: 嗯？你还真的挺顽强的，不是吗？也许跟以前过去那些挑战者不同，你有成功的机会。

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierThreeEndTex.Origin: Hmm? Your perseverance is truly a trait to behold. You've come further than even the demigods in such a short time.
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierThreeEndTex.Translation: 嗯？你的执着真的能算得上一个值得赞扬的品质啊。你在这么短的时间里，都已经超越半神了。

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierThreeEndTex.Origin: May your skills remain sharp for the last challenges.
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierThreeEndTex.Translation: 愿你的技巧能继续把这个锋芒保持到最后的挑战。

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierFourEndText.Origin: Hmm? So you've made it to the final tier, a remarkable feat enviable by even the mightiest of the gods.
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierFourEndText.Translation: 嗯？所以你就进入了最终阶段？这可是连最强大的神灵都会生羡的伟大壮举。

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierFourEndText.Origin: Go forth and conquer 'til the ritual's end!
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierFourEndText.Translation: 前进！征服！直到仪式的终结！

Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierFiveEndText.Origin: Hmm? You expected a reward beyond this mere pebble? Patience, the true reward will become apparent in time...
Mods.CalamityMod.BossRushTierFiveEndText.Translation: 嗯？除了这石头你还想要更多奖励？别急，真正的奖励迟早会出现……

Mods.CalamityMod.OpenSunkenSea.Origin: The depths of the underground desert are rumbling...
Mods.CalamityMod.OpenSunkenSea.Translation: 地下沙漠的深处轰隆作响……

Mods.CalamityMod.SandstormTrigger.Origin: The desert wind is blowing furiously!
Mods.CalamityMod.SandstormTrigger.Translation: 沙漠里刮起了猛烈的疾风！

Mods.CalamityMod.ThirdSageBlessingText.Origin: You have been blessed by the Third Sage!

Mods.CalamityMod.AcidRainStart.Origin: A toxic downpour falls over the wasteland seas!
Mods.CalamityMod.AcidRainStart.Translation: 一场剧毒暴雨席卷了整片废土之海！

Mods.CalamityMod.AcidRainEnd.Origin: The sulphuric skies begin to clear...
Mods.CalamityMod.AcidRainEnd.Translation: 硫磺色的天空开始放晴了......

Mods.CalamityMod.ProfanedBossText4.Origin: The Profaned Goddess has recognised your devotion to purity!
Mods.CalamityMod.ProfanedBossText4.Translation: 亵渎天神已经认可了你对纯净的贡献！

Mods.CalamityMod.GhostBossText4.Origin: The souls released stir the acidic storms...
Mods.CalamityMod.GhostBossText4.Translation: 喷涌而出的灵魂扰乱了这场酸性风暴...

Mods.CalamityMod.BrimmyBossText.Origin: A protective spell has been lifted from the crags! You can now mine Charred Ore.
Mods.CalamityMod.BrimmyBossText.Translation: 硫火之崖的一个保护咒语已经被移除！你可以挖掘焦炭矿了。

Mods.CalamityMod.ThirdSageBlessingText2.Origin: The Third Sage has rescinded its blessing...
Mods.CalamityMod.ThirdSageBlessingText2.Translation: 第三贤者收回了它的祝福...
